items.content_html: Fiscal Data Package is a lightweight and user-oriented format for publishing and consuming fiscal data. Fiscal data packages are made of simple and universal components. They can be produced from ordinary spreadsheet software and used in any environment.
items.title: frictionlessdata/datapackage-fiscal: Fiscal Data Package is a lightweight and user-oriented format for publishing and consuming fiscal data. Fiscal data packages are made of simple and universal components. They can be produced from ordinary spreadsheet software and used in any environment.

items.content_html: OfficeVibe is a lightweight communication app for colleagues to share informal messages, plan tea breaks, and foster a friendly office atmosphere. Keep the team connected effortlessly with this simple and easy-to-use app.

items.content_html: Contains a simple nodejs application that converts HTML to JSON with its hierarchical structure (jsongen.js) and a simple client application that parses JSON back into HTML (htmlgen.js), returning a parent HTML element with all the content. It's for use in my lightweight SPA lib that I'm currently developing, but I have no plans to make it public.
items.title: jorgeoliveirasantos/HTMLJSON: Contains a simple nodejs application that converts HTML to JSON with its hierarchical structure (jsongen.js) and a simple client application that parses JSON back into HTML (htmlgen.js), returning a parent HTML element with all the content. It's for use in my lightweight SPA lib that I'm currently developing, but I have no plans to make it public.
